name: OpenAPISecurityAudit
helpMarkDown: Performs API Contract Security Audit of OpenAPI files. Supports version 2 and 3 of OpenAPI JSON or YAML format. [See details](https://42crunch.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/PLATFORM/pages/743014819/CI+CD+integration)
author: 42Crunch

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API Key for authentication with 42Crunch platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add variable with this name to variables of the pipeline and set it to the API Key from 42Crunch Platform [See details](https://42crunch.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/PLATFORM/pages/743014819/CI+CD+integration)

inputs.name: collectionName
inputs.label: Collection Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Collection to store discovered OpenAPI files. If collection with specified name does not exits, it will be created. This collection will be purged on each pipeline run. [See details](https://42crunch.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/PLATFORM/pages/743014819/CI+CD+integration)

inputs.name: minScore
inputs.label: Minimum expected score for OpenAPI files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Minimum expected API Audit score. If OpenAPI file found to have score lower than minimum score, task will fail. You can set more granular failure conditions in the extension's configuration file. [See details](https://42crunch.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/PLATFORM/pages/743014819/CI+CD+integration)
